TopicTitle: I thought it would never happen.

Articles.Content:
Wow. I've logged over 2000 hours in this great game and today is the first time I've seen this.

I was beginning to think the game didn't like me.
It got mine after, 2 days of playing. Less then 20 hours.
I'm still waiting (since v18. 3) and who knows how many hours or sessions... one day...
Over 600 hours and still think haven't see it. I think it's a hoax... lol...
I've seen the Mun castle couple of times, but it is a very rare occurence. Congrats
About four years of playing KSP and I've never seen it. So I built my own:

About four years of playing KSP and I've never seen it. So I built my own:

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/61004449/KSP/1.0.4/VSR/screenshot148.png

You've never seen it?! Thats strange then, I keep on seeing it spring up here and there.

You've never seen it?! Thats strange then, I keep on seeing it spring up here and there.

I swear, the chance of the Mun Castle showing up must follow some obscure algorithm that calculates a random chance based on OS, day of the week, type of mouse plugged in, ratio of times you press the "W" key compared to other keys, or something, Randomness is random, but is it really so random that some can get it every 2 days and never in 4 years of playing?

Relevant Dilbert:

Well, technically, statistics do say yes..

You've never seen it?! Thats strange then, I keep on seeing it spring up here and there.

Perhaps I'm just unlucky? Or maybe it's popped up and I didn't notice? *shrug*
Your version is better anyway^^
Strange, I've reguarly seen the thing. Maybe your game just doesn't crash often enough.

I noticed that, until I installed 1.05, I never saw the Jeb on the Moon screen anymore... one or more of the mods must have done something to prevent it showing up. After 1.05, it pops up sometimes. The other day, I saw the castle! What cracked me up is that Jeb (why do I assume it's Jeb?) was actually sort of chuckling...
I got it once and took a screenshot. Then my computer had to be wiped because of viruses. I think I still have it on my grandma's computer though lol.

For some reason since 1.0 or some time around that I never got the Jeb on the Mun screen again. Since then I only have the "Kerbals in orbit" screen. Before I almost always hat Jeb on the Mun and I had the Muncastle quite a lot of times.

Is there any way to know how or why the orbit or mun start screens appear? I kind of miss the Jeb on the Mun screen

Perhaps I'm just unlucky? Or maybe it's popped up and I didn't notice? *shrug*

I'm in the same boat. Approaching 2 years, no castle.
I seen a....kerbin eclipse once on the titlescreen... It was very dark... Was it a bug or is it a thing?

[quote name='Red Iron Crown']Perhaps I'm just unlucky? Or maybe it's popped up and I didn't notice? *shrug*[/QUOTE]

Think about it, its losers who start KSP every day who stand a biggest chance. However, pros like you who fire up KSP once a release and then live with it, they don't stand a chance :-)

(I've seen my castle on my first KSP day (0.19) so I am definitely loser :-)

[quote name='MaxwellsDemon']I noticed that, until I installed 1.05, I never saw the Jeb on the Moon screen anymore... one or more of the mods must have done something to prevent it showing up. After 1.05, it pops up sometimes. The other day, I saw the castle! :D What cracked me up is that Jeb (why do I assume it's Jeb?) was actually sort of chuckling...[/QUOTE]

Since 1.0 the title screen is always the EVA Kerbals in orbit, I think. I thought that was intentional?

When I go back to the main menu after being in a game I always get the Mun scene.

[quote name='radonek']Think about it, its losers who start KSP every day who stand a biggest chance. However, pros like you who fire up KSP once a release and then live with it, they don't stand a chance :-)[/QUOTE]
I dunno, when messing around with VFX mods I might restart KSP a half dozen times in a session. Though I suppose now that I've mentioned it I'll see it next time I load it up.
I've spotted it a few times but ironically not scince I found out how rare it is supposed to be.

Almost 700 hours and never seen it...

I'm thinking y'all are being paid by the Big Sand Castle industry.... lolololol
I don't recall seeing it. Maybe I have, but I've always been more focused on getting to the game :P

"There is a Chance of 1/40 to have the little Mun-SandCastle displayed in the Main Menu." From this thread (Spoiler!!)[url]http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/60551-Spoiler-Easter-Egg-Stocktake-1-0-4[/url]

Mine took years and over 1000 hours too xD
At least you know what it is - props for that. This could easily have been another "Did I discover a new Easter Egg?" thread.
I got it like 3 times on the demo, then I never saw it. For 2 years.
